00030 #ifndef _LCD_H_
00031 #define _LCD_H_
00032 
00033 #include <avr/io.h>
00034 #include <inttypes.h>
00035 #include <avr/pgmspace.h>
00036 #include "config.h"
00037 
00038 
00039 // *****************************************************************************************
00040 //
00041 // Disclaimer: 
00042 // this code is based on HD44780U LCD library: http://homepage.hispeed.ch/peterfleury/avr-lcd44780.html
00043 // Author: Peter Fleury <pfleury@gmx.ch>  http://jump.to/fleury

00072 
00073 #if (__GNUC__ * 100 + __GNUC_MINOR__) < 303
00074 #error "This library requires AVR-GCC 3.3 or later, update to newer AVR-GCC compiler !"
00075 #endif

00081 #define XTAL 8000000              
00087 #define LCD_CONTROLLER_KS0073 0  
00093 #define LCD_LINES           2     
00094 #define LCD_DISP_LENGTH    16     
00095 #define LCD_LINE_LENGTH  0x40     
00096 #define LCD_START_LINE1  0x00     
00097 #define LCD_START_LINE2  0x40     
00098 #define LCD_START_LINE3  0x14     
00099 #define LCD_START_LINE4  0x54     
00100 #define LCD_WRAP_LINES      0     
00103 #define LCD_IO_MODE      1         
00105 #if LCD_IO_MODE
00106 
00121 #define LCD_PORT         PORTC            
00122 #define LCD_DATA0_PORT   LCD_PORT     
00123 #define LCD_DATA1_PORT   LCD_PORT     
00124 #define LCD_DATA2_PORT   LCD_PORT     
00125 #define LCD_DATA3_PORT   LCD_PORT     
00126 #define LCD_DATA0_PIN    4            
00127 #define LCD_DATA1_PIN    5            
00128 #define LCD_DATA2_PIN    6            
00129 #define LCD_DATA3_PIN    7            
00130 #define LCD_RS_PORT      PORTB        
00131 #define LCD_RS_PIN       2            
00132 #define LCD_RW_PORT      PORTB        
00133 #define LCD_RW_PIN       3            
00134 #define LCD_E_PORT       PORTB            
00135 #define LCD_E_PIN        4            
00137 #elif defined(__AVR_AT90S4414__) || defined(__AVR_AT90S8515__) || defined(__AVR_ATmega64__) || \
00138       defined(__AVR_ATmega8515__)|| defined(__AVR_ATmega103__) || defined(__AVR_ATmega128__) || \
00139       defined(__AVR_ATmega161__) || defined(__AVR_ATmega162__)
00140 /*
00141  *  memory mapped mode is only supported when the device has an external data memory interface
00142  */
00143 #define LCD_IO_DATA      0xC000    /* A15=E=1, A14=RS=1                 */
00144 #define LCD_IO_FUNCTION  0x8000    /* A15=E=1, A14=RS=0                 */
00145 #define LCD_IO_READ      0x0100    /* A8 =R/W=1 (R/W: 1=Read, 0=Write   */
00146 #else
00147 #error "external data memory interface not available for this device, use 4-bit IO port mode"
00148 
00149 #endif
00150 
00151 
00158 /* instruction register bit positions, see HD44780U data sheet */
00159 #define LCD_CLR               0      /* DB0: clear display                  */
00160 #define LCD_HOME              1      /* DB1: return to home position        */
00161 #define LCD_ENTRY_MODE        2      /* DB2: set entry mode                 */
00162 #define LCD_ENTRY_INC         1      /*   DB1: 1=increment, 0=decrement     */
00163 #define LCD_ENTRY_SHIFT       0      /*   DB2: 1=display shift on           */
00164 #define LCD_ON                3      /* DB3: turn lcd/cursor on             */
00165 #define LCD_ON_DISPLAY        2      /*   DB2: turn display on              */
00166 #define LCD_ON_CURSOR         1      /*   DB1: turn cursor on               */
00167 #define LCD_ON_BLINK          0      /*     DB0: blinking cursor ?          */
00168 #define LCD_MOVE              4      /* DB4: move cursor/display            */
00169 #define LCD_MOVE_DISP         3      /*   DB3: move display (0-> cursor) ?  */
00170 #define LCD_MOVE_RIGHT        2      /*   DB2: move right (0-> left) ?      */
00171 #define LCD_FUNCTION          5      /* DB5: function set                   */
00172 #define LCD_FUNCTION_8BIT     4      /*   DB4: set 8BIT mode (0->4BIT mode) */
00173 #define LCD_FUNCTION_2LINES   3      /*   DB3: two lines (0->one line)      */
00174 #define LCD_FUNCTION_10DOTS   2      /*   DB2: 5x10 font (0->5x7 font)      */
00175 #define LCD_CGRAM             6      /* DB6: set CG RAM address             */
00176 #define LCD_DDRAM             7      /* DB7: set DD RAM address             */
00177 #define LCD_BUSY              7      /* DB7: LCD is busy                    */
00178 
00179 /* set entry mode: display shift on/off, dec/inc cursor move direction */
00180 #define LCD_ENTRY_DEC            0x04   /* display shift off, dec cursor move dir */
00181 #define LCD_ENTRY_DEC_SHIFT      0x05   /* display shift on,  dec cursor move dir */
00182 #define LCD_ENTRY_INC_           0x06   /* display shift off, inc cursor move dir */
00183 #define LCD_ENTRY_INC_SHIFT      0x07   /* display shift on,  inc cursor move dir */
00184 
00185 /* display on/off, cursor on/off, blinking char at cursor position */
00186 #define LCD_DISP_OFF             0x08   /* display off                            */
00187 #define LCD_DISP_ON              0x0C   /* display on, cursor off                 */
00188 #define LCD_DISP_ON_BLINK        0x0D   /* display on, cursor off, blink char     */
00189 #define LCD_DISP_ON_CURSOR       0x0E   /* display on, cursor on                  */
00190 #define LCD_DISP_ON_CURSOR_BLINK 0x0F   /* display on, cursor on, blink char      */
00191 
00192 /* move cursor/shift display */
00193 #define LCD_MOVE_CURSOR_LEFT     0x10   /* move cursor left  (decrement)          */
00194 #define LCD_MOVE_CURSOR_RIGHT    0x14   /* move cursor right (increment)          */
00195 #define LCD_MOVE_DISP_LEFT       0x18   /* shift display left                     */
00196 #define LCD_MOVE_DISP_RIGHT      0x1C   /* shift display right                    */
00197 
00198 /* function set: set interface data length and number of display lines */
00199 #define LCD_FUNCTION_4BIT_1LINE  0x20   /* 4-bit interface, single line, 5x7 dots */
00200 #define LCD_FUNCTION_4BIT_2LINES 0x28   /* 4-bit interface, dual line,   5x7 dots */
00201 #define LCD_FUNCTION_8BIT_1LINE  0x30   /* 8-bit interface, single line, 5x7 dots */
00202 #define LCD_FUNCTION_8BIT_2LINES 0x38   /* 8-bit interface, dual line,   5x7 dots */
00203 
00204 
00205 #define LCD_MODE_DEFAULT     ((1<<LCD_ENTRY_MODE) | (1<<LCD_ENTRY_INC) )
00206
